contextId.occurrenceNote: "'Then Yahweh said, "Now rise up ... Zered.' So." This can be translated as an indirect quote. Alternate translation: "Then Yahweh told us to rise up ... Zered. So" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])

This can be translated as an indirect quotation. Alternate translation: "and he tells you to serve and worship other gods which you have not known," (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
contextId.glQuote: of which he spoke to you and said, 'Let us go after other gods, that you have not known, and let us worship them,'

contextId.occurrenceNote: This is the end of a quotation within a quotation that begins with the words "secretly entices you and says, 'Let us go and worship ... neither you nor your ancestors—" in verse 6. It can be translated as an indirect quotation. "secretly entices you and says that you should go and worship ... neither you nor your ancestors—any of the gods of the peoples ... other end of the earth." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
contextId.glQuote: any of the gods of the peoples ... other end of the earth.'

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated as an indirect quotation. Alternate translation: "have persuaded those who live in their city to go and worship other gods that they have not known." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
contextId.glQuote: have drawn away the inhabitants of their city and said, 'Let us go and worship other gods that you have not known.'

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated as an indirect quotation. Alternate translation: "they will ask with all the other nations why Yahweh has done this to the land, and what the heat of this great anger means." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
contextId.glQuote: they will say together with all the other nations ... mean?

contextId.occurrenceNote: This can be translated as a direct quote. Alternate translation: "I said, 'I will ... away, and I will ... mankind.'" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
contextId.glQuote: I said that I would ... away, that I would ... mankind.

contextId.occurrenceNote: If this direct quotation would not work well in your language, you may change it to an indirect quotation. Alternate translation: "he will tell you to destroy them!" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-quotations]])
